titleproper.value: Guide to the Larry Miller Fluxus Collection<lb/>1976-2011<lb/> <num>MSS.345</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2017-05-19T18:50:17</date>

abstract.value: The Larry Miller Fluxus Collection contains photographs and ephemera related to Flux-Tours conducted by Larry Miller.

p.value: Materials are open to researchers. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.

Published citations should take the
following form:<lb/><lb/>
Identification of item,  date (if known); Larry Miller Fluxus Collection; MSS 345; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
The Larry Miller Fluxus Collection was donated to NYU's Fales Library and Special Collections by Larry Miller and Sara Seagull, 2012.

Lee, Rooni. "Post from The Grey Art Gallery Blog, The Grey Area, Written by DAH Student Rooni Lee." Fields of Vision. N.p., n.d. Web. 06 June 2014. http://nyuarthistory.wordpress.com/2012/03/12/grey-art-gallery-blog-the-grey-area-post-by-dah-student-rooni-lee/.

The Larry Miller Fluxus Collection contains photographs and ephemera related to Miller's Flux-Tours, as documented in the Grey Gallery exhibitions, <emph render="italic">Fluxus and the Essential Questions of Life</emph> and <emph render="italic">Fluxus at NYU: Before and Beyond</emph>.

subject.value: Performance art |z New York (State) |z New York |v Exhibitions.
